website_summaries.verdict: Build anything, explore an endless world, and be limited only by your imagination.
pros: Minecraft gives players of all ages the ability to create, battle, and survive in a blocky universe that you can easily make your own
It’s constantly updated with free new content, and looks surprisingly good in 4K
Join friends playing on the Nintendo Switch, PC, and mobile devices
Play with up to 4 players at once
cons: There is a learning curve, but the game provides a handy tutorial

customer_reviews.title: Received a 360 version?
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Xbox One installation disk. Brand new. Plopped it into my Xbox one and tried opening it. The error came up: This game isn't playable here. For a list of Xbox 360 games playable on Xbox One, visit http:... Other installation disks and DVDs work just fine. Amazon needs to have some sort of online support for cases like this.
customer_reviews.author: Bojan V

customer_reviews.title: Wasted life...
customer_reviews.text: I spent more time than I would care to admit building on this game. Then, suddenly, my map is "corrupted" and I have to start over. I started a new one; and once again, I gets deleted the same way. I don't know if the server is unstable or what, but unless you are willing to build and then have it all just dissappear, don't waste your life playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Hannibal Wolong

customer_reviews.title: Glitchy
customer_reviews.text: I've loved this game for years, my only complaint is the glitches. Sometimes when switching dimensions, instead of spawning on the ground I spawn in the sky, falling to my death. The game crashes a lot and I have to reload the world, I made a purchase and it wasn't showing up, so I had to purchase it again. Even though I'm signed into xbox live I can't get achievements.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A

customer_reviews.title: Diamonds here I come!
customer_reviews.text: Same as I remember. Great time waster. Looking forward to cross play.
customer_reviews.author: Jaybay

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: New in packaging. Kids love it... I can’t figure it out... but from watching kids play together seems to promote teamwork and creativity.
customer_reviews.author: McKillican Valdes

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because our son got an xbox one and loves to play Minecraft. Previously we had an Xbox 360 and that version. He is very happy with this version of the game.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal H.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a physical disc
customer_reviews.text: I love this game but I thought this was like a download code so I’m sad it’s just a disc
customer_reviews.author: LittleScriv

customer_reviews.title: Do not work with xbox one
customer_reviews.text: The title is misleading. This minecraft version does not work with xbox one machine. It's a xbox 360 version even the item title, the box and the disc has printed label say 'xbox one'. For xbox one version, you'll need the one with 'XBOX ONE EDITION' right under the MINECRAFT title.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: My son hasn't stopped playing since he got the game in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: jeremiah buckel

customer_reviews.title: exactly as I expected
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time, perfect condition and works perfectly in our game console
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its minecraft.
customer_reviews.text: we got this for our 8 year old for Christmas. I know most games are purchased digitally now, however we wanted something physical to put under the tree. kid loves minecraft
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Grandkids!
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 and 10 year old grandkids love this game!
customer_reviews.author: shoptilludrop

customer_reviews.title: An oldie but goodie
customer_reviews.text: My grandson asked for this game, and he was delighted to receive it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mona L. Pelkey

customer_reviews.title: It's Minecraft
customer_reviews.text: It's Minecraft. What can go wrong? Absolutely nothing. It is a fantastic game that is enjoyable by all age groups.

customer_reviews.title: five stars
customer_reviews.text: My son plays it for hours both on servers as well as in the creative mode.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in good condition.
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as Console Minecraft, but does have some interesting options.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this game!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this game! Perfect condition and arrived on time! Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Kid likes it as much as I do!
customer_reviews.text: Got this game for myself...that being said my kid has become obsessed with this! I’ve even been using it as a reward or goal!

customer_reviews.title: PocketEdition
customer_reviews.text: Always loved it, played on the pocket edition until I bought this. Definitely a lot better than the PE version. Enjoyed it a lot.

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine

customer_reviews.title: Great game!!
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 best game I've ever bought, worth the time of day!

customer_reviews.title: Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our son's 6th Birthday. He loves Minecraft and this game. One of his favorites!

customer_reviews.title: Big flaw
customer_reviews.text: Super laggy on menu and when you open up the crafting table or furnace

product_meta.title: Minecraft - Xbox One
product_meta.description: Create. Explore. Survive. Minecraft is a game about placing Blocks and going on adventures. Explore the mighty mountains and living oceans of Infinite worlds, expanded further by free game updates, amazing community-made maps, servers, thrilling mini games and more! Survive online with friends on Console, mobile, and Windows 10, or Share the Adventure at home in split-screen multiplayer. List of supported cross-play platforms available at minecraft.Net. Additional storage, hardware, broadband (ISP fees apply), Microsoft account and Xbox Live may be required for setup, some updates, and features, including retention of gameplay settings and information. Online multiplayer on Xbox One requires Xbox Live Gold subscription (sold separately). game contains in-app purchases. .
feature_bullets: Create your very own world and build to the limits of your imagination
Explore mighty mountains and living oceans of Infinite worlds, amazing community-made maps, servers, thrilling mini games and more
Survive online with friends on Console, mobile, and Windows 10, or share the Adventure at home in split-screen multiplayer
